=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Elbahya Organic Healthy Foot Balm Moisturizing and Relief Nourishing Care for Tired Dry Cracked Feet and Heels, with Natural Ingredients Shea Butter and Lavender Essential Oil
Review Date: 2020/05/02
Store: Elbahya
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Elbahya', 'Scent': 'Lavender', 'Item Form': 'Balm', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '2.1 x 2.1 x 2 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '794168600683 646437595278', 'Manufacturer': 'Elbahya'}
Review Text: Just purchased this and received it today. I tried it after I soaked my feet. It was absolutely marvelous. I enjoyed the fresh minty feel on my feet along with hints of lavender. My feet were soft and pliable. Will purchase again.
Review Title: Marvelous feel.
Rating: 5.0

Augoog
{'Brand': 'Augoog', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Included Components': 'Face Massager', 'Package Dimensions': '7.5 x 4.75 x 1.95 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Testo-1', 'UPC': '728458420705'}
Just received it and tried it today. 1. The manufacturer didn't tell consumers in the instruction leaflet that the charging cord is a phone cord, needing to be hooked up via an adapter! 2. It works extremely quietly, in fact, were it not for the indicator lights, you'd think it wasn't working! 3. The "charge" feels very prickly..almost like a mild stinging sensation. It takes getting used to. I'll keep it up maybe once/day for a few...see what happens! My review may change...we'll see.
We'll see!

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

The user has a strong preference for cosmetic products, particularly eye makeup, with an emphasis on waterproof formulas for longevity. Their appreciation for high-quality items is reflected in positive reviews of effective mascaras, showcasing a trend towards practicality and performance. User-friendly packaging and brand reliability are significant factors in their purchasing decisions.

Recently, the user expressed interest in skincare innovations, such as a beauty device for anti-aging, indicating a desire to enhance both makeup and skincare routines. However, their cautious approach highlights the importance of long-term effectiveness. The user has shown growing enthusiasm for at-home skincare, demonstrated by a 5-star review of DIY facial sheet masks that emphasized simplicity and effectiveness for moisture and rejuvenation.

While their experience with a sugar scrub fell short due to an unsatisfactory scent, their latest interaction with a foot balm reveals a positive shift. They enjoyed the product's sensory experience, noting its fresh feel and lavender scent after use, which aligns with their standards for quality and sensory satisfaction. This indicates a broader exploration of skincare products beyond just facial care, focusing on effective solutions for overall body care.

Overall, the user maintains a balanced approach to cosmetic enhancement and skincare, favoring products that are easy to use, yield tangible results, and provide authentic sensory experiences aligned with their established expectations.
